name: The Bad Day (Soft Cover)
description: The Bad Day is a short story about a little bird who is having a very bad day. We follow him through his adventures as he tries everything he can think of to cheer himself up, until finally he has an idea which is tail-raising good. The Bad Day is printed in full colour on sustainably sourced paper and entirely created in Wellington, New Zealand. ON SALE for $9.95 until Christmas 2013!
